argumentText:
ARGUMENT
l

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | gsumconstf.k | |- F/_ k X |
| 2 |  | gsumconstf.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 3 |  | gsumconstf.m | |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ l X |
| 5 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( k = l -> X = X ) |
| 6 | 4, 1, 5 | #P_cbvmpt | |- ( k e. A |-> X ) = ( l e. A |-> X ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_oveq2i | |- ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( G gsum ( l e. A |-> X ) ) |
| 8 | 2, 3 | #P_gsumconst | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ A e. Fin /\ X e. B ) -> ( G gsum ( l e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( # ` A ) .x. X ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( G e. Mnd /\ A e. Fin /\ X e. B ) -> ( G gsum ( k e. A |-> X ) ) = ( ( # ` A ) .x. X ) ) |
